Params[3]: Our only target is that Corrupted!
We'll split up once Liv arrives at the designated point, understood?
This is the designated point according to the path prediction... All I have to do now is point and shoot.
I'm sure it's going to be very easy... with you here by my side, Commandant.
The Corrupted is heading to the commandant as we predicted. Are you ready?

Params[4]: Are we sure we're just going to leave it to Liv?

Params[3]: Hold on, I have to move forward a little bit to hit the target.
Wait, Liv! It'll discover you if you move!

Params[4]: I guess it's time for another review report.

Params[3]: We can't just wait for the next mission...
It was because of me that...
I must do my best to prove myself worthwhile to the Gray Ravens and Commandant as quickly as possible.
What if the commandant conducts special training with you, Liv?
(Nods) I'm certain you would give me constructive advice, Commandant.
Liv's combat experience is relatively lacking compared to the other Constructs'. How about you just accompany her with whatever she wants to do for now?
In that case... I'll count on you, Commandant.
